article_title: Social and ethical questions remain about baboon research
article_text:
Norman, OK (73070)

Today

Windy with thunderstorms, especially during the morning hours. A few storms may be severe. High 81F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy. A stray severe thunderstorm is possible. Low 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.
